name: VR Dinosaur Hunter
description:
Have you hunting? Have you experienced the feeling of shooting prey? This game uses VR technology to let you return to the world of prehistoric forests and give you a chance to experience hunting dinosaurs. You need to pick up the bow and arrow in your hand and aim at the dinosaur to shoot it. It is not until the blood bars above the dinosaur disappear, and you can complete the kill. You can clear the level if you complete 40 kills. Be careful not to be attacked by the dinosaur.

Operation method:
Shooting: the right handle trigger button
Forward: the left handle up/downward/downward
Right: Left handle left/right
Turn: Right handle left/right
Paramount: menu key
